comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:10.0a2) Gecko/20111202 Firefox/10.0a2
Build ID: 20111202042027

Steps to reproduce:

1. Open a RTL-Firefox(I used hebrew)
2. Open about 5 tabs
3. Drag a link or an image to the space between the third and the fourth tabs in the tab-bar
4. Drop it there


Actual results:

The indicator shows up at the end of the firefox window on the row of the tab-bar(after the "+" or "Tab Groups").
And the new tab is created between the second and third tabs.


Expected results:

The indicator should be placed at the correct place, and the tab should be created in the correct place.
